BOOST Description: BioRAM pathway identifier (primary key)
Notes: BioRAM program doesn't use pathway IDs like LCFS; contracts are per-facility not per-pathway

BOOST Description: BioRAM eligible fuel type classification
Notes: Real categories: HHZ fuel (Tier 1/2) vs non-HHZ; byproduct of sustainable forestry management

BOOST Description: Type of facility this pathway applies to
Notes: BioRAM focuses on biomass power plants; facility types defined in RFO documents

BOOST Description: Minimum efficiency requirement for BioRAM eligibility (fraction)
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section C
Notes: Form asks for Capacity Factor not efficiency standard; efficiency is facility-specific

BOOST Description: Carbon intensity in gCO2e/MJ for biomass fuel
Notes: BioRAM is RPS program not LCFS; CI values not tracked in BioRAM compliance

BOOST Description: Geographic applicability within State Responsibility Areas
Real BioRAM Source: CAL FIRE SRA / CPUC Fire-Threat Maps
Notes: State Responsibility Areas (SRA) are real CAL FIRE designations

BOOST Description: Eligible CAL FIRE hazard severity zones
Notes: Real zones: Very High / High / Moderate; also Tier 1/2/3 HHZ from tree mortality maps

BOOST Description: CEC BioRAM pathway certification date
Notes: CEC certifies facilities for RPS not pathways; certification is per-facility

BOOST Description: Pathway certification expiration date
Notes: Contracts have end dates (extended via Resolution E-5288 for contracts expiring before 12/31/2028)

BOOST Description: Current CEC eligibility status
Notes: Facilities have RPS certification status not pathways

BOOST Description: CEC BioRAM program version used for certification
Notes: Program versions tied to legislation (SB 859 original; SB 901 2018; SB 1109 2022)

BOOST Description: Maximum economical haul distance in miles
Notes: Economic haul distances studied but not codified as pathway limits

BOOST Description: Seasonal fuel availability characteristics
Notes: Fuel availability varies seasonally; studied in CPUC HHZ Fuel Availability Study

BOOST Description: Primary source region or forest management unit
Real BioRAM Source: CAL FIRE Tree Mortality HHZ Map / Tier definitions
Notes: Real regions: Sierra Nevada 10 High Priority Counties etc.

BOOST Description: Unique URI identifier for JSON-LD
Notes: JSON-LD identifier for BOOST system

BOOST Description: Timestamp of most recent pathway data update
Notes: Internal tracking field

BOOST Description: Unique identifier for quarterly BioRAM report (primary key)
Notes: IOUs collect quarterly data; format not standardized publicly

BOOST Description: Reference to biomass facility Organization entity
Notes: IOUs file Tier 2 Advice Letters with facility name/city/MW

BOOST Description: BioRAM contract identifier from competitive procurement
Notes: Contracts awarded via RFO process (e.g. BR-RFO-2024-01)

BOOST Description: Reporting quarter in YYYY-QN format
Notes: IOUs required to collect quarterly data from facilities

BOOST Description: Total biomass fuel consumed in bone dry tonnes
Real BioRAM Source: CPUC BioRAM Tracking - Total HHZ Delivered (BDT)
Notes: Tracked as Bone Dry Tons (BDT); ~1 BDT ≈ 1 MWh

BOOST Description: Total electrical energy generated in MWh
Notes: Energy generation verified through grid interconnection metering

BOOST Description: Overall facility efficiency (fraction)
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form - Capacity Factor
Notes: Form tracks Capacity Factor; efficiency is derived metric

BOOST Description: Contract efficiency target for BioRAM compliance
Notes: Contract-specific; not standardized across program

BOOST Description: Overall BioRAM compliance status for reporting period
Notes: Non-compliance triggers price drop from ~$120/MWh to $89.23/MWh

BOOST Description: Date and time report was submitted to CEC
Notes: Reports go to IOUs not directly to CEC

BOOST Description: Date of independent verification completion
Notes: IOUs perform annual audits to verify HHZ feedstock

BOOST Description: Whether third-party verification is required
Notes: Annual verification required by program

BOOST Description: Reference to VerificationStatement for independent verification
Notes: BOOST internal linkage; real audits documented in IOU filings

BOOST Description: CEC deadline for BioRAM report submission
Notes: Deadlines exist but not publicly standardized

BOOST Description: Transaction entity IDs for fuel procurement included in report
Notes: BOOST construct; real program tracks fuel deliveries not transactions

BOOST Description: Summary of fuel sourcing compliance metrics
Notes: Tracks: HHZ % Requirements / % from HHZ / Total HHZ Delivered (BDT)

BOOST Description: Volume breakdown by CAL FIRE hazard severity zones
Notes: Percentage of Total Biomass from HHZ tracked; ramp: 40%→50%→60%→80%

BOOST Description: Facility performance and grid contribution metrics
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section N
Notes: Form asks for operational characteristics / delivery profile

BOOST Description: Facility capacity utilization for the reporting period
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section C
Notes: Capacity Factor explicitly requested in project applications

BOOST Description: Environmental and fire hazard reduction benefits
Notes: Fire risk mitigation is program goal; CO2 not explicitly tracked in BioRAM

BOOST Description: Acres treated and firebreak contributions
Notes: Primary program objective is wildfire mitigation via fuel removal

BOOST Description: Financial performance and cost metrics
Notes: Contract price ~$120/MWh; penalty price $89.23/MWh

BOOST Description: BioRAM contract price per megawatt-hour
Notes: ~$120/MWh standard; drops to $89.23/MWh on non-compliance

BOOST Description: Unique URI identifier for JSON-LD
Notes: JSON-LD identifier for BOOST system

BOOST Description: Timestamp of most recent report update
Notes: Internal tracking field

BOOST Description: Target HHZ fuel percentage for the reporting year
Actual HHZ fuel percentage achieved
Notes: Percentage of Total Biomass Feedstock from HHZ Fuel

BOOST Description: Total HHZ fuel delivered in Bone Dry Tons
Notes: Total HHZ Delivered (Bone Dry Tons) - key compliance metric

BOOST Description: Cumulative HHZ usage in Bone Dry Tons
Notes: Total HHZ Usage To-Date (Bone Dry Tons)

BOOST Description: Breakdown of fuel by HHZ Tier (1/2/3)
Notes: Tier 1 vs Tier 2 HHZ sourcing (60% from Tier 1 required in BioRAM II)

BOOST Description: Facility nameplate capacity in MW
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section C
Notes: Nameplate MW AC at 100% project completion

BOOST Description: Net contract capacity in MW
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section C
Notes: Net Contract MW AC at 100% project completion

BOOST Description: IOU service territory (PG&E/SCE/SDG&E)
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section C
Notes: Project service territory determines contracting IOU

BOOST Description: CAISO/WDAT interconnection queue position
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section G
Notes: Queue Position for grid interconnection

BOOST Description: Full Capacity Deliverability Status
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section G
Notes: FCDS vs Energy Only bid type

BOOST Description: PPA contract term in years
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section E
Notes: Delivery Term: 5/10/15/20 years

BOOST Description: CEC RPS certification number
Real BioRAM Source: SDG&E Project Description Form Section L
Notes: CEC RPS Certification No. for eligible renewable resource
